_description: This file contains default settings for the contact allocator. CLI arguments will override these values.
_max_allocations_help: Maximum number of contacts each Spamurai can receive per run. Set to null for unlimited.
_contacts_tab_help: Name of the Google Sheets tab containing contact data
_spamurais_tab_help: Name of the Google Sheets tab containing Spamurai list
_priorities_tab_help: Name of the Google Sheets tab containing source priority mappings
